Author: Ieyeku
Text: I horde food. I am constantly cooking. Or I do this thing were I convince myself if I pay more I will DEFINENTLY eat it. But I end up not or it is stored for later. I lucky do not waste food I tend to preserve everything or cook banquets for others they say I am too sleepy to eat with them. I am a soup whore. Or more so broth. I have many pounds of animal bones   because I am always making it.

Author: scaredyk4t
Text: I wish I did. For some reason I’m always afraid I’ll run about of my safe foods since I’m comfortable bulking up on salads, fruits, and canned soup. So when theirs half a portion of spinach left I’ll go buy more. Or two cans soup, OMG I NEED TWO MORE!!!  So then I some times go grocery shopping twice a week. I’ve been a little better about it since I’m between jobs rn but still weird for someone with an ed I gues?
